decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL3/PP/2173/05, PL3/PP/2173/03, PL3/PP/2173/02, PL3/PP/2173/01: PL3/PP/2173/04, PL3/PP/2173/06, PL3/PP/2173/JR/00 Received 20 November 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The enlarged window shall be obscure glazed, non-opening below 1.7 metres above finished floor level, fitted with a limiter to ensure that it will not open further than 10 cm from any point of the static frame and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing or altered in any other way.
description: Variation of condition 4 (window) to allow the top hung part of the window to be openable of planning permission 00647/231/P8 approved 23/10/2017 for the enlargement of existing window on side elevation.
